prestext.Découvrez l'excellence dans la surveilla: Discover excellence in maritime surveillance and coordination. At the heart of the ocean, our center is a beacon of security and efficiency in regional waters. Drawing on our expertise, cutting-edge technologies and dedication without fail, we watch over the seas with vigilance and determination. Our missions are vast and varied...

formulaire.Bienvenue sur la section de déposition d: Welcome to the RMIFC Information Deposition Section
formulaire.Si vous avez quelconque information à vo: If you have any information at your disposal that you think could be useful to us: illegal fishing, boat entry and exit, traffic, tourism, and more, please submit it here

persoclés.Au CRFIM, nous nous engageons à assurer: At the RMIFC, we are committed to ensuring the safety and security of sea lanes in the Indian Ocean, working closely with our national and international partners.
persoclés.La coopération régionale est essentielle: Regional cooperation is essential to address the complex challenges of maritime surveillance. We are proud to collaborate with the RMIFC to strengthen coordination and information exchange among member states of the Indian Ocean Commission.
persoclés.La sécurité maritime est une priorité ab: Maritime security is a top priority for our government, and the work of the IMFRC in monitoring and information sharing plays a vital role in protecting our waters and marine resources.
persoclés.Ministre de la pêche et de l'économie bl: Minister of Fisheries and the Blue Economy

ressources.Le front axé au Centre et Sud de l'océan: The front focused on the Central and Southern of the Indian Ocean
ressources.Cette carte interactive présente notre z: This interactive map shows our coverage area, which encompasses the southeastern part of the Indian Ocean. You can explore different areas of interest, key shipping routes, as well as critical monitoring points.
ressources.Trouvez toutes les activités des vaissea: Find all ship activities listed here.
ressources.Nous vous garantissons des informations: We guarantee you up-to-date and reliable information regarding all vessel activities in the Indian Ocean area and much more. In collaboration with official resources such as Vesselfinder or the 'Sea Vision' platform, we only communicate information verified by a community of experts.

vcr.Devenez un héros des mers en rejoignant: Become a hero of the seas by joining the Maritime Information Fusion Center. As a volunteer, you will contribute to global maritime security by fighting illicit trafficking and coordinating operations with leading international organizations.Join- us to protect our oceans and ensure a secure future for all.
